extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisites    FREN212 and FREN220 and Level 4 and registration in a FREN or FRLG Plan.
Exclusion    No more than 3.0 units from FREN387; FREN487.

basic.description: Seventeenth-century texts in prose are studied in detail from the works of Cyrano de Bergerac, d¿Urfé, Scarron, Furetière, Guilleragues and Mme de la Fayette. Travaux pratiques include tests, an oral presentation and an in-depth essay. Given jointly with FREN 387/3.0.
basic.subject: FREN
basic.title: La prose au 17e siècle
